name: The Boring Hallway
description:
WARNING: EXTREMLY BORING GAME & this isn't a virus Welcome to The Boring Hallway. It is literally just a hallway. Just walk till you find the exit. There is nothing following you. Do not look behind you. THIS HALLWAY IS SAFE! GET ME OUT OF HERE Extremly Boring!
